ROMAN5.original: The area the cops search in is represented by the flashing zone on the Radar. Cops in this zone are marked by flashing red and blue icons.
ROMAN5.translated: 小地图上闪烁的区域表示警方的搜捕范围。范围内的警察会用红蓝交替闪烁的圆点标识。

ROMAN5.original: ~r~Roman's car was trashed.
You have evaded the cops. Stay out of trouble to completely lose your wanted level.
ROMAN5.translated: 你已经避开了警察。避免惹事生非，彻底摆脱通缉。

ROMAN5.original: To lose your wanted level escape the flashing zone and keep a low profile.
ROMAN5.translated: 逃出闪烁区域并低调行事以摆脱通缉。

ROMAN5.original: ~S~Reverse out of the garage.
If you are seen leaving the zone by the cops then they will refocus their search and a new zone will be created.
ROMAN5.translated: 若你在离开搜捕范围时被警察目击，警方就会重新划定搜捕范围。

ROMAN5.original: ~S~You can use the Pay 'n' Spray to clear your wanted level as long as the cops don't see you entering.
ROMAN5.translated: ~S~只要警察没有目击你进入，你就可以通过喷漆店清空你的通缉度。

ROMAN5.original: ~S~~INPUT_VEH_EXIT~ exit vehicle.
~S~Drive into the ~Y~Pay 'n' Spray.
Anyone seen performing a crime will gain a wanted level and the cops will attempt to hunt them down.
ROMAN5.translated: 任何人被目击实施犯罪行为都会获得通缉度，警方会全力追捕他们。

ROMAN5.original: ~S~It will repair and re-spray your vehicle and three hours will pass.
ROMAN5.translated: ~S~你的车辆将得到修理并重新喷漆，时间会前进3个小时。

ROMAN5.original: ~S~Drive to ~Y~Rotterdam Hill~S~ and meet Roman's customer.
~r~Jermaine is dead.
~S~Take Jermaine to ~Y~Masterson St.
~r~You have abandoned Jermaine.~s~
Your wanted level is represented by the number of stars on screen. The more stars the harder cops will try to catch you.
ROMAN5.translated: 画面上的星星数量表示你的通缉度。星星越多，警方的追捕力度越强。

ROMAN5.original: ~r~The vehicle is stuck.~s~
~S~Lose your wanted level.
~S~You have lost your wanted level, take Jermaine to ~Y~Gibson Street.
~S~Get in Roman's ~B~car.
